name: Opening Social: Sponsored by Lucid Chart
description: Our first event of the semester! Come listen to an awesome presentation by Lucid Chart to kick of the new semester. As always, there will be food and door prizes.

name: Recruitment Dinner
description: Sit down and enjoy a catered meal with industry recruiters. This is a great opportunity to network! Register before spots run out! You must pay your dues before attending the event. Arrive early and dress business casual.

name: Qualtrics Club Meeting
description: Tech talk (The Technical Interview) sponsored by Qualtrics. There will be door prizes and dinner provided like always!

name: Walmart Club Meeting
description: Tech talk sponsored by Walmart. There will be door prizes and JDawgs provided like always!

name: ExxonMobil Club Meeting
description: Tech talk sponsored by ExxonMobil. There will be door prizes and dinner provided like always!

name: Hack the Y (Hackathon)
description: ACM's annual overnight event! There will be a lot of food to eat, games to play, prizes to be won, and things to learn. Sign up now!
